text: janadhipathiwarayage pa්radhanathwayen eeye paswaruwe baththaramulla ‘ape gama’ parishrayedi pawathi sha්rilanipa widhayaka sabhawa saha samastha lanka karaka

ee atharin kantha anshaye tharaga isawwe padakkamak dina ganimata kilinochchiya mahadewa krida samajaye aar.thamil mahal samathwima wishesha siduwimaki.eya judo tharaga ithihasaye uthuru palathata padakkamak himiwu palamu awasthawa wiya.shri lanka judo sangamaya sanwidhanaya kala me tharagawaliye pradhana aaradhithayan lesa krida amathi mahindananda aluthgamage, parlimenthu manthri lohan rathwaththa, hitapu palath sabha manthri aananda aluthgamage, nawalapitiya nagaradhipathi nishantha ranasinha, pasbage korale pradeshiya sabhawe sabhapathi rohana bandara, judo sangamaye sabhapathi deshamanya gayan priyantha ha ema sangamaye lekam mejar tharindu wirasinha mahathwaru sahabhagi wuha.pirimi kandayam tharaga prathipala :kanishta wiwrutha-1.es.ke.rajasinha (jinaraja kri.sa), 2.bimsara siwali (rajans kri.sa), 3.chamalka rawindranath (kandi lans kri.sa) ha hasindu nimantha (wikramabahu kri.sa)wiwrutha-1.milinda bandara (wikramabahu kri.sa), 2.lahiru dhanapala (jinaraja kri.sa), 3.aar.ee.dhanushka (guwan hamudawa) ha em.bi.chandimal (yuda hamudawa)kandayam-1.shri lanka guwan hamudawa, 2.jinaraja krida samajaya, 3.shri lanka yuda hamudawakantha kandayam tharaga prathipala :kanishta wiwrutha-es.es.bandara (riwisanda kri.sa mawanalla), 2.ee.ke.wirakon (mayurapada kri.sa), 3.si.bi.jayalakshmi (riwisanda) ha ti.ke.naththarampotha (hasalaka kri.sa)kandayam-1.jathika tharuna sewa sabhawa, 2.jinaraja kri.sa, 3.shri lanka guwan hamudawa.

demala janawargika siwil wasiyan wishala sankhyawakata thaman samaga eemata bala karamin, eltiti balakayo diwayine eesanadiga werala thiraye pihiti wata wu bhumi pa්radeshayakata semin pasubassaha. 2009 janawari masaye di aarambha wu wata wu bhumi pa්radeshaya thula satana, eltitieeya wisin siwil janaya minis palihawal lesa yoda ganimath, aanduwe hamudawan wisin wagawibhagayakin thora wa janaya padinchi wi siti pa්radeshayanta wishala kalathuwakkuwalin wedi thabimath samaga uga්ra wiya.

‘ee’ shreniye tharagawaliyata sahabhagiwana kandayam halawatha meriyans, es.es.si, waraya adhikariya, bi.aar.si, en.si.si, kolts, ragama kri.sa, sarasans, muwars, baduraliya kri.sa, drawida sangamaya, si.si.si, yuda hamudawa, migamuwa kri.sa ‘bi’ shreniye tharagawaliyata sahabhagiwana kandayam blumfilng, lankan, galla kri.sa, kaluthara nagarika, guwan hamudawa, kurunagala yowun, panadura kri.sa, nawika hamudawa, nugegoda kri.sa ada dina pawathwena tharaga waraya adhikaraya saha muwars athara aar.premadasa kridanganayedi si.si.si saha es.es.si athara es.es.si kridanganayedia kolt saha sarasans athara kolts kridanganayedi adath wasi wawnathiw polisiye niladharin dedenek abhirahas lesa miya yayi

aththatama premaye sithuwili wala aakarshanaya prathamayenma athiwanne rupayata ya.ee bhawayan pitata no penana nisa wiya haki ya.tharuniyak nam kadawasam tharunayakuta da,tharunayek nam siyumali tharuniyakata da alum kirima rupaye ema prabala bawa widaha dakwayi.saba premaye uppaththiya siduwanne elesa thama kamathi sundara rupaya langa sitha nathara wu wita ya.githaye palamu pada thunen arthawath wanne eya yi.jagath wikramasinhayan ema arthaya api katath samipawa danena lesa gayana karayi.mema githayata api kawuruth kamathi ee nisa ya.athithaye di yudha wirayange katha wagema prema wirayange katha da apata hamuweyi.romiyo-juliyat,jak-ros,kusa-paba,joda-akbar kawuruth danna handunana nidasun we.namuth mema githaye pada rachakaya ee kisiwek mayim no karayi.ohuge ekama wiraya thamamayi.lokaye hondama aadarawanthaya thama bawa ohu thama neth sith gath aadarawanthiya hata kiyayi.
